com.metreeca.rest.services

Interface Store

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Store.FileStore

    public interface Store
    Blob store.

    Provides access to a dedicated system store for binary data blobs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Store.FileStore
      Storage blob store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream read(String id)
      Reads a data blob.
      static Supplier<Store> store()
      Retrieves the default store factory.
      OutputStream write(String id)
      Writes a data blob.

    • Method Detail

      • store

        static Supplier<Store> store()
        Retrieves the default store factory.
        Returns:
        the default store factory, which creates Store.FileStore instances

      • read

        InputStream read(String id)
          throws IOException
        Reads a data blob.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the data blob to be read
        Returns:
        an input stream for reading from the data blob identified by id
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if id is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if id is not a valid data blob identifier for the backing blob store
        NoSuchFileException - if id is not the identifier of an existing data blob
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while opening the input stream

      • write

        OutputStream write(String id)
            throws IOException
        Writes a data blob.

        Write operations must be atomic, that is existing data must be made available for reading until the operation is completed by closing the output stream.

        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the data blob to be written
        Returns:
        an output stream for writing to the data blob identified by id
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if id is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if id is not a valid data blob identifier for the backing blob store
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while opening the output stream
